11.content: What does your muggle family do for a living?
11.title: Muggle Professions?

choices: Sit there for a few more minutes.
111.content:
You wake up, your dream fading from your mind. It was a good dream, but you can't remember it exactly. Your alarm clock keeps beeping. Stretching your arm to snooze it, you turn over and close your eyes. You can hear the muffled voices of your parents. You lay there in content, imagining all sorts of ideas. Looking at a potted plant by your window, you can see it shift a few millimeters. Maybe it was your imagination, you ignore it.

Your door creaks open. Your mum puts her soft hands on your head.

"Honey, it's time to get up!"

You open your eyes, "Okay, mum."

She sighs, "Your father must get to work early. There's a procedure he will have to supervise. That means you will have to do a bit before going on the computer."

Do you...
111.title: The Flower Pot

choices: Clean up the mess, and get your chores done.
1112.content:
Your mum leaves you be, giving you a chance to gather your thoughts. You lay there, for a few moments. Then you hear a slam, the window opens. You look at it, then you noticed something move. It was the potted plant.

Then the plant zooms past your ear and shatters against the wall. You stand there in shock. The wind couldn't have been that strong, you tell yourself in your mind.

Your parents come back to the room.

"What did you do!?" Your father shouts, upset.

"Henry, look at the glass! It's broken!" Your mum points out the broken shards on the carpet.

You put up your hands. "It's not what you think! The window just opened and it flew by me!" you explain hastily.

Your parents look at each other, your father says, "Ugh, I don't have time for this! You must do all the chores as your punishment, or else you will be grounded!"

As they walk out of your room you can hear your mum say, "Clean up the glass, won't you!"

You stare at the door, of which your parents left just moments before. You feel exhilarated as you remember what happened. You can't believe such a strange thing has just happened.
1112.title: Broken glass

choices: You ignore it and go to school
It turns out to be a cat and you leave it alone
11121.content:
It always made you wonder why they were so uptight. It wasn’t like you were trying to break the window, or upset them. Why would you?

Sighing, you slipped out from beneath the warmth of the covers and went to go get the supplies to clean the glass up.

Not long after it was cleaned, you walk over to the window again and see a strange paw. But of what, you have no idea...
11121.title: Clean up the mess, and get your chores done.

choices: Grab the alarm clock and throw it out the window, one of the maids will find it.
Get up, get dressed, brush teeth...
Wake up cursing the bloody thing.
121.content:
You wake up in your bed, a smile still existent after an amazing dream. You were at the Quidditch World Cup Series, your favorite team won the entire season! You cheered for them as pixies swooped all around the spectators. Then you heard a loud, deep horn, which snapped you back to reality. You turn over as you try to remember all the complex moves the quidditch players performed, nearly perfectly.

Your alarm clock shouts at you "Get up! You've got a special day ahead of you!"

It is true. Your mother is expecting you to come with her to do a bit of shopping, not that you enjoy it all that much.

Do you...
121.title: Get up!

choices: Pretend to be sick, she's kind when this happens.
Get out of bed and toss the rubbish out.
122.content:
You groan as your dream of walking down Diagon Alley with a hundred galleons to spend ends abruptly. Your smile fades as you realize your day will be filled with endless chores, and without the use of magic, will be grueling. You hear footsteps below, your family must be up. The creaking of the stairs lets you know that your mum or sister was going to bother you.

The door opens, "Good morning, Sunshine!" your mum says, "I need to take out the bin. Your father can't keep making that enlargement spell inside it. He's a fool if he keeps doing it."

Do you...
122.title: Good Morning, Sunshine!

info.brief_description: Your first year at Hogwarts! What will you do with your time there?
info.description:
DISCLAIMER!!!
Most content belongs to the owner (J.K. Rowling), not me!

Some of the story may not be accurate!

This is for everyone! Any inappropriate language or topics may be reported!

Have fun with creating the best, most magical, first year ever!
